SELECT og.id, g.name 'goods_name',g.play_num, rm.name 'room_name', rd.name 'round_name', og.package_name,og.package_price,og.play_time,og.create_time FROM rm_order_group og, rm_goods g,rm_room rm,rm_round rd
og.goods_id = g.id AND og.room_id = rm.id AND og.round_id = rd.id
AND g.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{goodsName},'%')
AND og.play_time >= CONCAT('','${playTimeStart}',' 00:00:00')
AND og.play_time <= CONCAT('','${playTimeEnd}',' 23:59:59')
